title: Dulcinea
episode_desc: In the asteroid belt near Saturn, James Holden and the crew of the ice freighter Canterbury, on its way to Ceres Station, investigate a distress call from an unknown derelict ship, the Scopuli.
show_desc: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

title: The Big Empty
episode_desc: Holden and crew are trapped in a badly damaged shuttle. On Ceres, Miller uncovers clues about Julie Mao. On Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala questions a terrorist.
show_desc: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

title: Remember the Cant
episode_desc: While Avasarala plays a dangerous game of politics, Holden and his crew are forced to turn on one another while held captive by the Martian Navy.
show_desc: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

show_desc: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

title: Salvage
episode_desc: A derelict vessel holds a potentially devastating secret. Holden and his crew cross paths with Miller on Eros. Avasarala receives bad news.

title: Critical Mass
episode_desc: A flashback to Julie's origin story reveals her trajectory. Holden and Miller finally meet and team up to get to the bottom of the strange emergency situation happening on Eros. As the true horror of the events on Eros is revealed, an ailing Holden and Miller must overcome incredible odds if they hope to live to fight another day. Part 1 of 2
